Hi there! I'm Jean from Shanghai, China. Here are several facts that help you know me:

- I was born and raised in Anhui, China. My hometown is most known for _Mount Huang_, which is also my surname
- I have a ragdoll cat back home. She is now 14 months old and her name is my childhood nickname _Snowball_
- My current plan is to kick off my career as a consultant at [OC&C Strategy Consultants](https://www.occstrategy.com/en/)


Please continue reading to know more about my background!

### Education 

- I studied in [Hefei No.1 High School](https://www.facebook.com/hfn1hs/) and was a member in the Model United Nation Association there
- I studied in [Fudan University](https://www.fudan.edu.cn/en/) and obtained my BSc in physics in Jun 2020
- In Fall 2018, I went to ![UCLA] for a fall-semester exchange in the physics department. I also joined the kickball team organised by my flatmates on the hill.
